title: Does the iPhone 12 Pro have a notch display? - Quora

response.answer_text: All iPhone models this year feature Super Retina XDR OLED displays for the first time, with an edge-to-edge design with the exception of the Face ID notch and small bezels around the edge. There's no difference in display quality between the standard iPhone 12 models and the Pro models.
Off course it has the same notch like all previous iphones this is because of face id sensor as apple needs to fit in the notch so the notch is continuously available until apple announce
